title: Most popular multi-purpose cleaning products in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2013
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents currently purchasing for 8 number of Product Types.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is highest at Product Type Flash and lowest at Product Type Cilit bang.
There is a difference of 18.0 between the maximum Product Type Flash and minimum Product Type Cilit bang.
min_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Product Type, and Share of respondents currently purchasing in each Product Type on the y axis.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is highest at Product Type Flash and lowest at Product Type Cilit bang.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents currently purchasing for 8 number of Product Types.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is highest at Product Type Flash and lowest at Product Type Cilit bang.
There is a difference of 18.0 between the maximum Product Type Flash and minimum Product Type Cilit bang.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Product Type in the x axis and Share of respondents currently purchasing in the y axis.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is appeared to be the highest at Product Type Flash and lowest at Product Type Cilit bang.
There is a difference of 18.0 between the maximum Product Type Flash and minimum Product Type Cilit bang.
The Product Type Flash has the highest Share of respondents currently purchasing, followed by , and Dettol. Down to the Product Type Cilit bang which is the lowest.
Product Type Cif, and Cif (cream) share the same value 22.0.
The lowest value 20.0 at Cilit bang is almost 1.43 times smaller than the average value 26.5.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is 212.0 if we add up values of all Product Types.
